Description:
Tradie's heaven on 660sq
This unique solid brick Victorian style double storey is in a prime location surrounded by other quality homes. A rare opportunity to purchase a quality built home. Comprises:-
- Cosy lounge at the front of the home with stunning rock feature wall and Coonara wood fire plus a feature wall with 100 year old bricks
- Adjoining meals area
- Timber kitchen with stainless style appliances
- Laundry with loads of cupboards
- Four bedrooms with built-in robes
- Upstairs living room with ornate tiled fire place opening onto verandah and separated from the 4th bedroom with bi-fold door creating an ideal space for a teenager or in-law needing privacy
- Family bathroom with large shower and claw-foot bath
- Two toilets
- Storage under stairs
- Ducted heating
- Double garage with built-in bar
- Inground pool with built-in BBQ area
- Room for trailer or caravan
Walking distance to Rangebank Pre-School and Rangebank Primary School, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre & Thomson Parkway and access to public transport. Can life get any better?
Contact Matt Dewan today to arrange an appointment to view this property.
Insights: 110 Marylyn Place, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
BRAND NEW ! - Buy off the Plan
To be built this quality two bedroom home set on own small block (no body corporation) within walking distance to Cranbourne Railway Station, two primary schools, child minding centre, doctors, local shopping centre and also is handy to Cranbourne Central Shopping Complex. The home consists of two bedrooms, walk through bathroom with separate bath, shower and vanity. Open plan kitchen/dining and living, laundry, separate toilet, lock up garage with auto roller door and direct access into dwelling and also a door to side of house area. Features include instant gas hot water unit, rangehood, electric hotplates, wall oven, dishwasher, Led lights, external sensor light and more.

Description:
EASY LIVING IN BRINDALEE ESTATE
Here presents an exciting opportunity for buyers looking for a property that is positioned in a quiet locale, close to all amenities and on a low maintenance block.
* Featuring 3 spacious bedrooms, main bedroom with a full ensuite and walk in robe
* Large living areas with lounge, dining and family room
* Fully appointed kitchen with heaps of bench and cupboard space
* Separate main bathroom, laundry and toilet
* Lovely pergola to enjoy the summer mornings
* Single lock up garage with auto door and internal access
* Ideal position close to all Cranbourne amenities
* Set on approx. 318sqm of land
AUCTION: SATURDAY 17TH JUNE AT 2:30PM (IF NOT SOLD PRIOR)
TERMS: 10% DEPOSIT, BALANCE 30 DAYS
PLEASE NOTE: PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
QUALITY FAMILY LIVING ON A HUGE 1,800m2 APROX. BLOCK!
Situated in a very private and secluded court location in one of the most sought after estates in Cranbourne is this large quality built family home set on almost half an acre of land, yet only a stone throw away from schools, parks and shopping centre. But with a property as big as this one you won't need a park to play some cricket or kick the footy, you can do it all from your very own backyard. Listed below are just some of this homes features;
- 4 bedroom brick veneer family home.
- All bedrooms are large in size.
- Master with full ensuite & WIR's.
- Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all with BIR's. Bedroom 4 has a second lot of robes acting as a study nook.
- Four zoned living areas comprising of front lounge, formal dining, family room & theatre room.
- Hostess style kitchen with loads of bench space, adjacent to a king size pergola/sun room for all year round entertaining with family, friends and or just to relax.
- Two lots of double car garages, one single car garage and one built in carport.
- Huge backyard with garden shed, veggie patch, manicured gardens and plenty of open space.
As you can see this one has it all and is almost certain to tick all of your boxes.
So if you are looking for a large family home on a massive block with plenty of room for car storage, tools, machinery, or to run a business from home and still with a great size backyard for the kids to play... Then look no further!
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.
Jason Brown : 0423 768 424

Description:
Central Location
Nestled in a court location and only 2 on the block is this well presented 3 bedroom unit close to schools, shops, public transportation and family parks.
This home offers a central kitchen with an open plan, L shaped meals/living area. The kitchen is complete with gas & electric cooking, dishwasher whilst the home has floor boards throughout, GWF and an air-conditioner.
The 3 bedrooms are of good size and finished with built in robes and surround the family bathroom whilst outside offer a rear garden shed, single carport and solar panels.
*Photo ID required at ALL Inspections.

Description:
Everything At Your Fingertips
Whether you are looking for the ideal location to reside or the perfect investment, an inspection inside will not disappoint. This low maintenance property comes complete with 2 robed bedrooms, a generous size lounge equipped with split system, floating floors and tiles throughout. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space and a large window allowing plenty of natural light. It also overlooks a shaded and paved courtyard, adjacent to the good sized lawn area.
You may not need the car to go to the shops, so leave it at home inside the single lock up garage with external access to the rear.
It is located in a perfect position. All you need is to cross the road and you are at the door step of Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre. Other amenities nearby include medical centres, petrol station, Cranbourne train station, Cranbourne Park primary school, Cranbourne secondary school, take away restaurants and High street shops.
For more information on this outstanding property, Call Paul.
*Photo Identification required for Open for Inspections*
Footer:
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $280-$290 p/w ($1,216 - $1,260 pcm) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.

Description:
STUNNING BRAND NEW TOWNHOME!
SALE BY FIXED DATE: 8/6/2017 (IF NOT SOLD PRIOR)
How often would you find a Brand New Unit in a quiet location and within minutes to amenities? Well here is your chance!!
* On offer 3 bedrooms with built in robes, full ensuite to master, spacious lounge room, tiled meals with slide doors out to courtyard, gorgeous kitchen with Caesar stone benchtops and overhead cupboards.
* Luxury features high ceilings, quality stainless steel appliances, ducted heating, split system cooling, LED downlights, ample storage good sized laundry, remote control double garage.
* A property to suit all buyers whether you're looking to downsize, invest or a first home buyer who can take advantage of the first home buyers grant of $10,000 and stamp duty concession.
* No body corporate fees, two on the block, 18sq URL on an easy to maintain landscaped block.
All this within minutes to a choice of good schools: Cranbourne East Primary, Cranbourne East Secondary College, Casey Grammar School, Chisholm Tafe. Also a short drive to Hunt Club Shops, Selandra Shops, Train station and Bus transport making this a GREAT buy!
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED ON ALL INSPECTIONS

"Fantastic, affordable opportunity
If you are looking for a low maintenance home then this is the one for you! Offering perfect presentation and a great location. This home would be ideal for first home buyers, an investor or someone looking to downsize.
Surround by well-presented homes and set adjacent to Amstel Golf Course, this exciting opportunity is situated in a new estate and is within short distance to primary and secondary schools, shopping centres, recreation fields and the train station. Fairway Park is an opportunity to get your foot in the door at this evolving and convenient location, with everything you desire right at your doorstep.
Within walking distance to stunning parklands with BBQ facilities and the Amstel club open 7 days and boasts a fully licensed restaurant, new TAB & Sports bar, kids play area, multiple function rooms and hosting live entertainment weekly.
Offering 2 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe. Central kitchen with ample Caesarstone bench tops and cupboard space. The kitchen over looks family/meals area leading out to the court yard.
Features include:
- Ducted heating
- Split system air-conditioning in master bedroom and living area.
- Stainless steel appliances
- Caesarstone bench tops in the bathrooms
- Court yard

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT/ UNDER OFFER!
CRANBOURNE : The proud owner of 99 Clarendon Street has decided to move on leaving behind a beautiful family home with unlimited potential. Set on a large block of app. 766m2 nestled in a blue chip location surrounded by all of the town centre's local amenities. Ideally suited to investors, developers, land bankers and even those looking to occupy with the aim to cash in down the track!
A stunning home in its own right, with a recent change in zoning to Activity Centre Zone means that this property has been earmarked by the City of Casey council for conversion into opportunities such as a medical centre or other professional practices. There's also the option for future redevelopment with the guild lines.
The true central location is what makes this property very appealing! You are literally a brisk walk to High Street and recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre allowing you, or your future clients have easy access to an array of shopping outlets and cafes/restaurants.
The property itself makes an immediate impression from the street and will not disappoint when you walk through the front door. A generous lounge room with gas heater and wall air con upon entry with easy access to the kitchen, meals and additional family room, study or kids retreat. The kitchen equipped with gas cook top, oven, dishwasher, microwave provision and plenty of bench and cupboard space. 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, the master finished with a walk through his and her robe with access to the family bathroom, with over bath shower and separate toilet.
Outside be greeted but a great outdoor pergola area perfect for all year round use, mature easy maintenance landscaping with plenty of grassed area for the kids and pets to enjoy. The oversized covered carport sits at the end of a long concrete driveway perfect for extra cars, boats, trailers etc. The added bonus is the converted shed that can be used as a studio, home office, business space that has been fitted out with plaster walls, lights, power and a complete separate 2nd room.
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favorable conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
PLAN FOR THE FUTURE
This 609M2 block is only minutes from Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Schools, All levels of Medical, Railway Station, Transport, Racing Centre and many more.
House has already been extensively renovated, has a big backyard, possible subdivision STCA.
- 3 Bedrooms.
- Lounge and Family.
- Single Garage.
- Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
Great investment potential, First Home , Future development (STCA).
With the location and this big block you will need to be quick to secure this opportunity.
For an immediate inspection call Colin Butler.

Description:
2000m2 corner site. development opportunity
We are able to offer this site , consisting of three existing properties, to be sold as one holding only.
Magnificent location, only a couple of minutes from the Cranbourne Park shopping centre, close to schools, childcare, doctors, specialists, park opposite and only minutes from the train and public transport.
Developers, Developers, Developers.
Currently three homes in this parcel with tenants if required.
Never before has such a large parcel of land been offered in this area so there is no time , act now!!!
For an immediate inspection call Colin Butler.
